works.description:
Do not book with any travel agents, who declare they are acting as “agent for consumers.” (to avoid complying with the atol regulations).

Do you really want to trust your hard earned monies, to someone who acts like that.

This will cause you to be without flight plus ATOL protection, on your holiday, if it is sold as a flight and accommodation deal.

OFT or office of fair trading is demanding the travel industry end it’s grossly misleading charges on debit and credit cards.

A clampdown on airlines and travel companies charging ‘misleading’ surcharges for online payments by debit card is being imposed by the Office of Fair Trading.
The idiot who drove Dream Holidays to the wall, set up last year by former Libra Holidays boss Akis Kyprianou, has ceased trading. Libra also went bust.
